Bahāristān
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jāmī , 1414-1492

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to the colophon (f. 87r), copy completed on 18 Rabīʻ al-Thānī 1050 AH [August 6, 1640 AD].
Written in one column, 15 lines per page, in black and red. Comments in the margin.
Boards covered with decorative paper ; brown leather on spine.
Cream laid paper. 20.7 x 14.8 cm. (16 x 9 cm.)
MS Persian 42. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Sufism
Sufi poetry, Persian
